textContent:
How do players learn the initial abilities of each class? Is it a fast forward? Do they have to do a tutorial? Maybe only for the first time they multiclass? 

How do they discover and learn new abilities? Quests? From replication? Events? Paying up? Reading scrolls?
title: Explanation for
textContentHtml:
How do players learn the initial abilities of each class? Is it a fast forward? Do they have to do a tutorial? Maybe only for the first time they multiclass? 


How do they discover and learn new abilities? Quests? From replication? Events? Paying up? Reading scrolls?
